description:
Gintoki and Kagura visit Shinpachi in the hospital after a car accident. Even in the hospital the Odd Jobs Trio is noisy as usual. An old man in the next room overhears their conversation and asks for their help. He requests that they look for a woman from the old man’s bittersweet memories. The only lead they have is a kanzashi, and that the kanzashi’s owner worked at a Dango shop. The Odd Jobs Trio begin their search but find that nobody seems to remember the Dango shop, and they quickly reach a dead-end. Kagura tries having Sadaharu trace the scent from the kanzashi, and the place Sadaharu leads them to is not at all what they expected…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bechabecha Shita Dango Nante naa~ Dango ja nee~ Bakayaroo~
Look, Overly Sticky Sweet Dumplings Are Not Real Dumplings, You Idiot!
Wässriges Dango ist kein Dango, Blödmann!
べちゃべちゃした団子なんてなぁ団子じゃねぇバカヤロー
